headline.value: Craft a success journey that scales with every segment

description.value: Map onboarding, adoption, and expansion rituals in one actionable grid for CSMs and growth teams.

items.title: Success journey blueprint
items.description: Every touchpoint is orchestrated with measurable leading indicators and ownership clarity.
list: Welcome milestone: align on business outcomes and executive sponsor.
First value: deliver guided walkthrough with instrumentation attached.
Momentum: schedule adoption councils with usage dashboards embedded.
items.footnote: Customer health scoring updates instantly as steps complete.

items.title: Segment-aware onboarding
items.description: Self-serve or white-glove flows adapt based on ARR, industry, and region.

items.title: Health signals
items.description: Blend product usage, support sentiment, and exec engagement in one view.
list: Champion participation tracked with meeting intelligence.

items.title: Champion activation
items.description: Capture testimonials, referrals, and advocate spotlights.
list: Advocacy ladder to show next best ask.
Auto-trigger G2 and Gartner review requests.

items.title: Expansion playbooks
items.description: Detect expansion readiness and tee up success + sales collaboration.
list: Usage tipping points matched to upgrade offers.
Sequence cross-sell cadences when health is green.

items.title: Community moments
items.description: Invite customers into communities, advisory boards, and office hours.
list: Segmented forums with product area owners.
Office hours schedule auto-personalized to timezone.
